title: Budget 2022: Government wants to push thematic funds focussed on deep-tech, agri-tech and climate change - Economic Times
content: Budget 2022: Government wants to push thematic funds focussed on deep-tech, agri-tech and climate change  Economic Times
description: According to Nirmala Sitharaman, the government will limit its share to 20% in the new funds, which will be managed by private fund managers.
